channel.title: Crimson Scape 718 - VPS - Soul Wars - Pest Control
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/vhrl6p.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=7]CrimsonScape[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Website:[/B] [URL=http://www.crimsonscape.com][U]Click Here![/U][/URL] [B]Forum:[/B] [URL=http://www.crimsonscape.com/forums][U]Click Here![/U][/URL] [B]Client:[/B] [URL=https://mega.co.nz/#!ZAZ1HAIJ!-EhHIRP06PzSiYgaz2fbR-7rP8_tzelkzuna3biQ58c][U]Click Here![/U][/URL] Jar is Recommended (If you lag just change the customs display settings to DirectX and it will be fine!) [B]Jar:[/B] [URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/64qtokk5wmkoek7/CrimsonScape.jar?dl=0][U]Click Here![/U][/URL]
[B]Why you should play CrimsonScape?[/B]
[B]Great Starter pack. Soul Wars & Pest Control RuneSpan Custom Dungeoneering. Donator Land with 3 levels. All new smooth and clean PvP system. Fair Combat and Skilling XP. Unique interfaces. Highly active Staff and Community. many custom Bosses and custom items to choose from. Multiple Minigames inc. Castle Wars, Barrows and many more. ALL 25 skills working 100%. DoubleXP weekends. Stable and highly active economy. Many unique combat and skilling shops. Voting system with corresponding shop. PVM rewards Unique Crystal Key reward chest, with amazing rewards. And much, much more.[/B]
[B]So[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.crimsonscape.com"]JOIN NOW[/URL] [B]and start your adventure today!![/B]
[B]Pictures below;[/B]
